content:
1
Determined optimal pricing for Promotions based on historical volume and 
price trends, to maximize gross margins at an apparel retailer
Apparel Brand
(Optimal Pricing Analyses)

SITUATION
VALUE ADDITION
IMPACT
ABOUT THE CLIENT
Company is a large U.S. based apparel and lifestyle brand, with ~100 stores across the U.S., along with e-commerce and catalog platforms
2
PROMOTION EFFECTIVENESS FOR AN APPAREL BRAND
â–ª
Company had a wide range of departments and was offering significantly higher discounts across all departments on a regular basis leading to 
lower gross profits and margins
â–ª
Merilytics partnered with the Finance, Operations and Sales teams to evaluate the promotions strategy at a department and channel level, and 
recommend an optimal promotion calendar for the Holiday season, Spring & Fall
â–ª
Aggregated sales transaction data at a â€œitem-dayâ€ level by department (e.g., Menâ€™s Sweaters, Boys Pants, Womenâ€™s accessories etc.) and channel 
(e.g., Internet, Retail, Outlets etc.) using past 24 months data. Adjusted data for day of week  variance, Seasonality, YoY organic growth, and 
special discount days (Black Friday, Cyber Monday etc.)
â–ª
Calculated the promotion lift for each season (Summer, Spring, Fall, Holiday season etc.) to identify the impact on volumes from discounts
â–ª
Recommended optimal discounts to be offered on a daily basis for each department and season in order to maximize the gross profit
â–ª
Applied business constraints based on inventory availability, total promotion spend etc. to develop a promotion calendar for the season
â–ª
Our promotion calendar recommendations at a daily department-channel level could help the company potentially improve gross profit by 
~20%
â–ª
Identified systematic way to track promotions and its impact on volumes, so that performance can be tracked real-time and mid-season 
adjustments to the calendar can be made if required

Plot absolute % change in discounts vs. % change 
in volumes for past 7 days, for each day
Relationship between discounts and volumes 
was determined
